title: IGI 2: Covert Strike {175MB RIP} PC Game
description:
IGI 2: Covert Strike (Highly Compressed Game)
It's a Come2down RIP

The game is a stealth-based first person shooter. It is the sequel to Innerloop's Project I.G.I.: I'm Going In. The original, published by Eidos Interactive, offered only single-player play. Chris Ryan, a former Special Air Service operative best known for being the lone successful escapee of Bravo Two Zero, served as a consultant to the game.

IGI 2 : Covert Strike
Publisher: Codemasters
Developer: Innerloop
Released: March 3, 2003

Minimum System Requirements:
*OS: Windows 95/98/ME
*Processor: Pentium III
*Memory: 128 MB
*Hard Drive: 1.9 GB Free
*Video Memory: 32 MB
*Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
*Keyboard and Mouse
